periods.name: Today
periods.shortForecast: Sunny then Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms after 5pm. Sunny. High near 97, with temperatures falling to around 94 in the afternoon. Northwest wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Tonight
periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Partly Cloudy
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 10pm. Partly cloudy. Low around 68, with temperatures rising to around 70 overnight. East northeast wind around 3 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.
